content: **pattern description from *last-minute knitted gifts* ** also called fingerless gloves these quick-to-knit warmers keep wrists and the upper part of the hands toasty while preserving finger dexterity in mildly cold weather they can be worn as is when it s really cold they can be layered with gloves underneath they are shown here in women s and men s 1 versions the men s 2 pattern is great for all ages even cool teenage boys who worry that handknits might be too girlish for them one size fits just about everyone a handy feature for gifts **finished size ** will stretch to fit hand sizes up to 8 20 5 cm around about a woman s size large **finished measurements ** circumference about 6 5 16 5 cm around unstretched and 6 5 16 5 cm long **yarn ** noro cash iroha 40% silk 30% lambswool 20% cashmere 10% nylon 100 yards 91 meters / 40 grams #84 raspberry 1 skein **needles ** two 8 20 cm circular needles size us 6 4 mm change needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge **notions ** yarn needle scissors stitch marker 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mens-hand-wrist-warmers 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mens-hand-wrist-warmers
